title: BfArM-MVH/GRZ_QC_Workflow pipeline - params.input schema
description: Schema for the file provided with params.input

sample.errorMessage: Sample ID is required and must not contain spaces.

runId.errorMessage: runId is required, must be unique per sample, and must not contain spaces.

libraryType.errorMessage: libraryType is required and must be one of: panel, wgs, wes, panel_lr, wgs_lr, wes_lr.

sequenceSubtype.errorMessage: sequenceSubtype is required and must be either 'somatic' or 'germline'.

genomicStudySubtype.errorMessage: genomicStudySubtype must be one of: 'tumor+germline', 'tumor-only', or 'germline-only'.

sequencerManufacturer.errorMessage: sequencerManufacturer must be a non-empty string naming the sequencing platform manufacturer.

reads_long.errorMessage: reads_long must be an existing file path without spaces, ending in '.bam', '.fastq.gz', or '.fq.gz' for long reads.

reads1.errorMessage: reads1 must be an existing FASTQ file path without spaces, ending in '.fastq.gz' or '.fq.gz' for the first read in a pair (R1).

reads2.errorMessage: reads2 must be an existing FASTQ file path without spaces, ending in '.fastq.gz' or '.fq.gz' for the second read in a pair (R2), and may only be given if reads1 is also provided.

aligned_reads.errorMessage: Path to aligned reads must exist, end in '.bam' or '.cram', and cannot contain spaces. fastp_json must be provided together with aligned_reads.

fastp_json.errorMessage: Path to fastp/fastplong JSON report must exist, end in '.json', and cannot contain spaces. It must be provided for runs with aligned_reads.

bed_file.errorMessage: Path to target bed file must exist, end in '.bed' or '.bed.gz', and cannot contain spaces.

reference.errorMessage: The reference genome has to be either GRCh37 or GRCh38

targetedRegionsAboveMinCoverage.errorMessage: targetedRegionsAboveMinCoverage must be a number between 0 and 1.

percentBasesAboveQualityThreshold.errorMessage: percentBasesAboveQualityThreshold must be a number between 0 and 100.

meanDepthOfCoverageRequired.description: Required minimum mean depth of coverage for the sample.
meanDepthOfCoverageRequired.errorMessage: meanDepthOfCoverageRequired must be a positive number.

minCoverage.description: Minimum per-base coverage used as threshold for coverage-based metrics.
minCoverage.errorMessage: minCoverage must be a positive number.

targetedRegionsAboveMinCoverageRequired.description: Required fraction (0–1) of targeted bases at or above minCoverage.
targetedRegionsAboveMinCoverageRequired.errorMessage: targetedRegionsAboveMinCoverageRequired must be a number between 0 and 1.

qualityThreshold.description: Minimum Phred base quality used to define high-quality bases (typically 20 or 30).
qualityThreshold.errorMessage: qualityThreshold is required and must be a positive integer.

percentBasesAboveQualityThresholdRequire.description: Required percentage (0–100) of bases with base quality at or above qualityThreshold.
percentBasesAboveQualityThresholdRequire.errorMessage: percentBasesAboveQualityThresholdRequired must be a number between 0 and 100.
